com.customlbs.shared.geo

Class GeoCoordinateUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.customlbs.shared.geo.GeoCoordinateUtil

  • public class GeoCoordinateUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Geographic coordinate utility. Constants from WGS84 standard.

    NOTE: Assumed is that the rotation angle in the Building table of the database means the angle between North-East and X-Y in the map.
